data.text: @maziehirono Obama did more deportations during his tenure. Why didn’t you say anything about it huh?
@maziehirono You are a moron. The family was not broken up, they were kept together and would have been deported together.
@maziehirono Invaders are not welcome.  We only support legal immigrants.

@maziehirono What'd you say when Obama was setting the All Time Deportation record?

His nickname was literally The Deporter in Chief and his record still stands!
@maziehirono Coming here illegally & putting your children in danger, that’s on democrats & the parents.

@maziehirono When is the deadline for Noem to resign?  
Resigning isn’t enough. They all need to be investigated, charged, arrested, and prosecuted for every single one of their crimes against humanity. 
Time for talk, posts, letters is over. 
Time for action is now.  
#DoSomething

@maziehirono Pick a stance idiot. You either want kids together with their parents while being deported or you don’t. Democrats, especially you are too stupid to realize you contradict yourself. Morons!

@maziehirono Lol  “ single-minded”! Have you not heard Macy how about all the peace deals? Have you not heard about destroying Iran’s nuclear capabilities? Have you not heard about the strong economy and more money in Americans pockets? Pull your head out and you might hear something.

@maziehirono They do not have to be taken from their parents. Everyone can stay together as they go back to their home countries. If it were not for Biden, Harris. & Mayorkas letting in millions of illegal aliens, totally unvented and unvexed we would not be in this situation. Did you forget?

@maziehirono 25th Amendment

Please exert pressure to remove him. He is unfit.

#25thAmendmentNow 
#trumpisaracist
